javadoc: Dialog for editing the import options for a selected importer format.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Contructs a new OptionsDialog for editing the options associated with a specific import format
 such as PE, ELF, XML, etc.

params.name: originalOptions
params.comment: the list of options generated from the specific import format selected.

params.name: validator
params.comment: a callback for validating the options as they are set.

params.name: addressFactoryService
params.comment:
a service for retrieving the AddressFactory if needed. This is
 passed instead of an actual AddressFactory, because to get an AddressFactory, it might
 require that a language be loaded or a program be opened and not all options require an
 AddressFactory.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the list of Options with the values as they were set in this dialog.
@return the list of Options with the values as they were set in this dialog.
methods.name: getOptions
methods.comment: Returns the list of Options with the values as they were set in this dialog.

return.comment: the list of Options with the values as they were set in this dialog.

name: OptionsDialog
comment: Dialog for editing the import options for a selected importer format.
